text:
-rvAM dEvau dEqvEShva-ni#Sitaq-mOjaqstau nO# mu~jcataqmAga#saH ||
yadayA#taM ~Mva~Mhaqtu(gm) sUqryAyA$-stricaqkrENa# saq(gm)q sada#miqcCamA#nau |
staumi# dEqvA vaqSvinau# nAthiqtO jO#havImiq tau nO# mu~jcataqmAga#saH ||
maqrutAM$ manvEq adhi#nO bruvantuq prEmAM ~MvAcaMq viSvA# mavantuq viSvE$ | 
AqSUn. hu#vE suqyamA#nUqtayEq tE nO# mu~jcaqntvEna#saH ||
tiqgmamAyu#dhaM ~MvIDiqta(gm) saha#svad diqvya(gm) SarddhaqH - [  ] 36
